title: Analysis of Female Learners' Experiences in University Makerspaces: A Phenomenological Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Analysis of gender-based experiential differences when utilizing makerspaces in language education.

learning_goals: Female learners' experiences in makerspaces can be analyzed through phenomenological interview methods
Three or more gender-based learning barriers occurring in makerspace environments can be identified
Two or more improvement plans for a female-friendly makerspace can be proposed based on analysis results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
